title: GitHub Workflow Run Deletion Audit Record

status: stable
---

## Audit record for workflow-run deletion

Repository:
Owner:
Run by:
Date (UTC):
Approval:
Approver (name + email):
Reason for deletion:
Retention policy change applied: (yes/no)
Backup file(s):
Notes / verification steps:

Signed-off-by:
